comment.body:
Why would you turn on "Ignore generic cosmetic filters"?

And as I now realise: Why on earth does uBlock Origin even have that option?

comment.body: The blank spaces are most likely embedded tweets, from what I can determine. Try turning off AdGuard Social Media and see if that makes the tweets show up properly.

comment.body:
Not only is this not working, but it actually affected my other devices
including my Amazon Fire which doesn't have Adguard installed. Somehow,
Adguard sent something to hbomax.com that basically kicked me off, and I
had to reauthenticate on my devices.

On Mon, Jul 11, 2022 at 3:27 PM Robert Miller ***@***.***>
wrote:

> Why did you close this? This hasn't been fixed. It still won't allow
> HBOMAX.com to work unless I turn it off completely.
>
> On Mon, Jul 11, 2022 at 3:16 PM Alex ***@***.***> wrote:
>
>> Closed #122871
>> <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/122871> as
>> completed.
>>
>> —
>> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
